description: The GA-01 RTO code was originally assigned to Panaji in North Goa district but is currently not in use. Vehicle registrations for Panaji are now handled by GA-07 (Tiswadi taluka).
address: Directorate of Transport, 1st Floor, Patto Centre, Panaji, Goa
note: This RTO code is not in use. For Panaji registrations, please refer to GA-07.

description: The GA-02 RTO code was originally assigned to Margao in South Goa district but is currently not in use. Vehicle registrations for Margao are now handled by GA-08 (Salcette taluka).
address: 1st Floor, Matanhy Saldanha Administrative Complex, South Goa Collectorate, Arlem, Margao, Goa
note: This RTO code is not in use. For Margao registrations, please refer to GA-08.

description: The GA-03 Regional Transport Office (Mapusa RTO) handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Bardez taluka in North Goa district. Mapusa is a major commercial hub and the headquarters of Bardez taluka.
address: Assistant Director of Transport Office, 1st Floor, Government Administrative Building, Mapusa, Bardez, Goa

description: The GA-04 Regional Transport Office (Bicholim RTO) handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Bicholim and Sattari talukas in North Goa district. The region is known for its mining industry and historical temples.
address: Assistant Director of Transport, 1st Floor, Govt. Building (Mini Secretariat), Bicholim, Goa

description: The GA-05 Regional Transport Office (Ponda RTO) handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Ponda taluka in South Goa district. Ponda is famous for its Hindu temples and spice plantations.
address: Asst. Director of Transport, Ponda, Ground Floor, Susheela Plaza, Upper Bazar, Ponda, Goa

description: The GA-06 Regional Transport Office (Vasco RTO) handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Mormugao taluka in South Goa district. Vasco da Gama is home to Goa's major port and Dabolim Airport.
address: Ground Floor, KTC Bus Stand, Vasco-da-Gama, Goa

description: The GA-07 Regional Transport Office (Panaji RTO) handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Tiswadi taluka in North Goa district. Panaji is the state capital of Goa and a major administrative center.
address: Assistant Director of Transport, 1st Floor, Junta House, Panaji, Goa

description: The GA-08 Regional Transport Office (Margao RTO) functions as the office of the Assistant Director of Transport for South Goa. It handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Salcete taluka. Margao is the commercial capital of Goa and the headquarters of South Goa district.
address: Assistant Director of Transport, South Goa District Collectorate Building (Matanhy Saldanha Administrative Complex), Margao, Salcete, Goa

description: The GA-09 Regional Transport Office (Assistant Director of Transport, Quepem) handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Quepem and Sanguem talukas in the South Goa district. This office provides licensing, registration, and permit services for the hinterland region known for its mining history and wildlife sanctuaries.
address: Office of the Assistant Director of Transport, Govt. Multi-Storeyed Building, Quepem, Goa

description: The GA-10 Regional Transport Office (Canacona RTO) handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Canacona taluka in South Goa district. The region is famous for Palolem and Agonda beaches.
address: Sub-Regional Transport Office, Canacona Municipal Council Building, Chaudi, Canacona, Goa

description: The GA-11 Regional Transport Office (Pernem RTO) handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Pernem taluka in North Goa district. The region borders Maharashtra and is known for Arambol and Mandrem beaches.
address: New Administrative Complex, 2nd Floor, Pernem, Goa

description: The GA-12 Regional Transport Office (Assistant Director of Transport) handles vehicle registrations and transport services for Dharbandora taluka in South Goa district. Dharbandora was established as Goa's 12th taluka in 2011, primarily carved out from Sanguem taluka.
address: Assistant Director of Transport, Government Administrative Complex, Dharbandora, Goa
